section.title: Searching for items in editors and browsers
section.para: The ITE offers a search function in most editors and views.

listitem.para:
Start the search function either via:
Edit-->Find
or using the context-sensitive menu in the editors and browsers.
In the find dialog, you can enter the following criteria:
The text you are searching for.
The direction you want to search in.
Whether the search is case sensitive or not.

Whether you are using regular expressions ().
Regular expression searches are case-sensitive.
Whether the search should be wrapped. This will carry on the search from the top of the browser once you reach the bottom of the browser.
Items which correspond to the search terms are highlighted in gray.
